title: Renovated 2br/1ba with bay view in luxury high rise!!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', "Located in the heart of Tacoma's Stadium District, Orion is a newly renovated high-rise community offering 1 & 2 bedroom apartments and penthouses with panoramic views of Mt. Rainier, Puget Sound, Wright Park and the desirable New Tacoma city lights.", 'Enjoy living in the "#1 most walkable" district in Tacoma with nearly 200 restaurants, bars, coffee shops and local parks nearby.', 'Orion also offers convenient access to Tacoma Link Light Rail and 705/I-5.', 'Our modern amenities collection includes a 24-hour fitness facility & yoga studio, cinema room, clothes care center, online rent payment, a rooftop terrace, and a 1,500 sq.ft.', 'community room with a contemporary kitchen and complimentary wi-fi.', 'We welcome you to experience life on a higher level in our refreshed, urban community.', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'Today', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Pets Welcome Upon Approval.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Animal license through the city of Tacoma and vaccination record current for rabies required.', 'Cats:$150 deposit and $150 non-refundable fee required.', 'Monthly rent of $15 will be charged.', 'Dogs:Dogs are welcome on floors 2-6.$250 deposit and $250 non-refundable fee required.', 'Monthly rent of $35 will be charged.', 'Certain breed restrictions and breed-mixes are prohibited at all times.', 'Prohibited breeds include but are not limited to:Akita, Alaskan Malamute, Boxer, Bull Mastiff, Bull Terrier, Bulldog, Chow Chow, Doberman Pinscher, Dogo Argentino, German Shepherd, Husky, Mastiff, Pitbull, Presa Canario, Rottweiler, Siberian Husky, Staffordshire Terrier, and Wolf Hybrid.', 'Deposit:', 'None', 'Leasing options:', 'Leasing notes:', 'None', 'Application fee:', 'None', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Utilities Cost:', 'None', 'Laundry:', 'Parking type:', 'Parking notes:', 'None', 'Appliances:', 'Exterior:', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Wiring:', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Security and Access:', 'Views:', 'Additional features:', 'Offered by:', 'The Orion and The Miller', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
